scripts.install: npm --prefix src install && npm --prefix functions install
scripts.build: npm --prefix src run build && npm --prefix functions run build && npm run hosting
scripts.hosting: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public/assets && cp -r src/.nuxt/dist/* public/assets/. && cp -a src/static/. public/
scripts.clear-all: npm run clear && rm -rf functions/node_modules src/.nuxt src/node_modules */package-lock.json */*.log
